alert.note: Alert for Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 31 at 4:22PM EDT until July 31 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Horry County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 421 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Barefoot Landing Area Of North Myrtle Beach, or near North Myrtle Beach Airport, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, North Myrtle Beach, Little River, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Wampee, Hand, Nixonville, Barefoot Landing Area Of North Myrtle Beach, Briarcliffe Acres, Atlantic Beach, Sea Coast Medical Center and Grand Strand Regional Medical Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
